text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Haa... My legs feel heavy today somehow...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: But maybe overcoming situations like this is what makes a proper Umamusume...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Heavy... but I'll do my best... Though it's heavy... but I'll still do my best...
Matikanetannhauser might still have fatigue from the race. It seems necessary to review future race schedules.
